sentences.sentence: A primate of the superfamily hominoid ea.
sentences.translation: 人总科的一种灵长类动物。

sentences.sentence: Men who are denied affection for too long devolve into some kind of rage-filled hominoid. Their anger becomes palpable. You can almost feel the wrath emanating from their pores.
sentences.translation: 他们因为长年没有情感滋润，甚至退化成脾气暴躁的类人猿，甚至从他们的每个毛孔里你都能看出他们的暴躁来。
